definition: Wu Zun or Chun Wu (1979-), Bruneian actor, vocalist of Fei Lun Hai (Fahrenheit)
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: Share everything you wanna share with Chun.
sentences.chinese: 分享你想和吳尊分享的一切。

sentences.english: But in my heart, a man named Chun is the best one.
sentences.chinese: 但是在我心裏，一個叫吳尊的人是最好的。

sentences.english: For some of the donors including the superstar himself, it was their first time donating blood.
sentences.chinese: 他們中的一些人，包括吳尊本人都是第一次捐血。

sentences.english: Fitness Zone's Managing Director Wu Chun conducted a health talk for the students.
sentences.chinese: 健身區董事總經理吳尊進行了一次談話爲學生健康。

definition: Jiro Wang (1981-), Taiwanese singer and actor
(coll.) to look alike/to be a spitting image of
unwell/indisposed/out of sorts/euphemism or honorific for ill
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
voice change (at puberty)/to alter one's voice (deliberately)/to sound different (when angry etc)
to bombard/to bomb/trad. also written 炮轟
to turn tears into laughter (idiom); to turn grief into happiness
(of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
